ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
PrecisAppointment of W. AUGUSTUS RICHARDSON, Q.C. of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a part-time member of the Public Service Labour Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years.
